description.desc: Powerful and enigmatic Elemental Mage, who specializes in manipulation of air and storm elements. With mastery over winds, can summon fierce gusts to blow away enemies or create protective barriers around allies.

appearance.clothing: Flowing robes adorned with symbols of air and storm elements

abilities.name: Elemental Affinity
abilities.description: Increased power and control over air-based spells

abilities.name: Storm Magic
abilities.description: Ability to call down lightning bolts, create thunderous booms, and manipulate the weather itself

abilities.name: Wind Manipulation
abilities.description: Ability to create powerful gusts of wind, capable of knocking back foes or clearing away debris

abilities.name: Aeromancy
abilities.description: Expert in the art of aeromancy, capable of scrying the future by observing the patterns of the wind and clouds

abilities.name: Arcane Knowledge
abilities.description: Vast knowledge about magic and its workings gained as a sage

personality.goals: To uncover the secrets of the elemental planes and unlock the full potential of her storm magic

description.desc: Charismatic and talented Bard, well-versed in various instruments, but true passion lies with the lute, which she plays with unmatched skill and grace. Natural charm and eloquence make her an excellent diplomat and negotiator, often defusing tense situations before they escalate into violence.

appearance.skin: Fair with a touch of rosy warmth
appearance.clothing: Colorful and stylish, adorned with various trinkets and baubles that jingle softly. Carries a beautifully crafted lute, its polished wood inlaid with intricate silver filigree.

abilities.name: Bardic Inspiration
abilities.description: Can inspire allies with stirring words or music, granting them a bonus on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description: As a Bard, has access to a wide range of magical spells, which she can use to heal, protect, or harm as needed.

abilities.name: Jack of All Trades
abilities.description: Skilled in many areas, gains a small bonus to any ability check she is not proficient in.

abilities.name: Song of Rest
abilities.description: During short rests, can play soothing music to help allies recover more hit points.

abilities.name: Expertise
abilities.description: Honed skills in specific areas, granting double the proficiency bonus for those skills.

personality.goals: To ensure the safety and happiness of her companions, and to satisfy her boundless curiosity and love of adventure.

description.desc: Skilled and cunning Elf Ranger, expert archer and tracker, using her keen senses and knowledge of nature to hunt down her enemies and protect her allies.

appearance.hair: Long, flowing silver hair often tied back in a practical braid
appearance.skin: Fair with a slight golden hue
appearance.clothing: Well-crafted leather armor adorned with intricate patterns and symbols that blend seamlessly with her natural surroundings. Carries a finely crafted longbow, as well as a set of twin daggers for close-quarters combat.

abilities.name: Favored Enemy
abilities.description: Elara has chosen a specific type of creature as her favored enemy, granting her bonuses to tracking and combat against that foe.

abilities.name: Natural Explorer
abilities.description: Elara's time spent in the wilderness has made her an expert in navigating and surviving in various terrains, allowing her to move stealthily and find food and shelter with ease.

abilities.name: Archery Fighting Style
abilities.description: Elara has mastered the art of archery, giving her a bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons.

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Elara can magically mark her quarry, dealing extra damage and gaining advantage on tracking them.

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.description: As a Wood Elf, Elara has increased movement speed, allowing her to cover more ground quickly and evade her enemies with ease.

personality.values: Respect for the natural world and its creatures
personality.goals: To maintain balance and harmony wherever she goes, and to protect her friends and allies from harm.

description.desc: Courageous and devoted Gnome Paladin, who has sworn an oath to protect the innocent and uphold justice. Wields the power of divine light against the forces of darkness, using his unwavering faith and martial prowess to smite evil wherever it may lurk.

appearance.hair: Neatly trimmed white hair and a well-groomed, bushy white beard
appearance.clothing: Gleaming plate armor emblazoned with the symbol of his deity. Carries a mighty warhammer imbued with divine power.

abilities.name: Divine Smite
abilities.description: Thoric can channel divine energy through his weapon attacks, dealing radiant damage to his foes.

abilities.name: Lay on Hands
abilities.description: With a touch, Thoric can heal wounds and cure diseases or neutralize poisons.

abilities.name: Aura of Protection
abilities.description: Thoric's presence grants allies within 10 feet a bonus to their saving throws, as he shields them from harm with his divine aura.

abilities.name: Channel Divinity
abilities.description: Thoric can call upon the power of his deity to perform miraculous feats, such as turning undead or bolstering his own combat abilities.

abilities.name: Tinker
abilities.description: As a Rock Gnome, Thoric possesses a natural affinity for working with tools and machinery, allowing him to create small mechanical devices or repair broken equipment.

personality.goals: To spread the light of goodness wherever he goes, and to protect the innocent and uphold justice.
